A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was outstanding. Have loved Star Wars since I was a child. I cant believe people are on here saying its terrible or stupid\, I genuinely dont get it\, and to be honest I feel bad for them. For me\, I got so hyped watching this movie my heart was beating out of my chest. Yes\, the movie does look and feel different\, yes\, it does take risks and try new things\, and a lot of people arent open to that but if you want to see an amazing\, emotional\, epic installment in the Star Wars series\, keep an open mind and go see it.
